name: skateboarding, jazz and dog attacks
description:
Journal entry: shoot day 4

“we burned through lilly fields with the crumbling city now behind us. viktor rolling on behind. everything was rolling. the hills. the clouds. life. rolling in perfect succession again. our systematic synchronicity. the vibrations from the city softening as we took flight. sids van coughed like his breakfast cigarette but pulled through in the end. what we found was everything perfect and with that, night fell and wonderfulness. the bears, the fire, the aliens. we fantasied under the naked night wrapped in the stillness of the lake while the stars painted the skyline”

miles away (2021)
director: s.c. wilson
cinematographer: viktor wallmark
skateboarder: theo jones
hours got away
original track by: iihan saferali, ben siegerson, lucan dubovik, ben boardman, todd stewart

dimensions: 3840x2160
